svg.title: Present weather additional phenomenon: Precipitation of hail
svg.desc: WMO international weather symbol: Present weather additional phenomenon: Precipitation of hail: Shower(s), at the station during the preceding hour but not at the time of observation, of snow or hail or small hail or snow pellets, with or without rain; or precipitation, at the station at the time of observation; either snow with rain or drizzle, or showery precipitation of hail, small hail or snow pellets; or with current or recent thunderstorm
